channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Viral Signup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Viral Signup

item.title: CVE-2024-6927|2024-08-29T14:01:43.225Z -- unknown -- viral%20signup
item.description: The Viral Signup WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-6927|2024-08-29T06:00:03.179Z -- unknown -- viral%20signup
item.description: The Viral Signup WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
